species.name: skarmory
descriptions: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
A Pok√©mon that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from SKARMORY to make swords and knives.
Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
Its body is draped in steel armor. It looks heavy, but it can fly at speeds of up to 185 miles an hour!
Its feathers, which fall off as it grows, are thin and sharp. In times long past, warriors used them as swords.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
